amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for periodic censuses and programs by $4 million and increases funding for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance (mental health courts program) by $2 million and State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance (veterans treatment courts program) by $2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Periodic Censuses and Programs by $4 million and to increase funding for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance (mental health courts program) by $2 million and State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance (veterans treatment courts program) by $2 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
